verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Kum ba ya, my Lord, kum ba ya!
Kum ba ya, my Lord, kum ba ya!
Kum ba ya, my Lord, kum ba ya!
O Lord, kum ba ya!

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Someone's crying, Lord, kum ba ya!
Someone's crying, Lord, kum ba ya!
Someone's crying, Lord, kum ba ya!
O Lord, kum ba ya!

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Someone's praying, Lord, kum ba ya!
Someone's praying, Lord, kum ba ya!
Someone's praying, Lord, kum ba ya!
O Lord, kum ba ya!

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Someone's singing, Lord, kum ba ya!
Someone's singing, Lord, kum ba ya!
Someone's singing, Lord, kum ba ya!
O Lord, kum ba ya!

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Hear our prayer, O Lord hear our prayer,
Keep our friends,O Lord in your care;
Keep our friends O Lord in your care.
O Lord ,Kum ba yah.
